remarks: A "local" form of ~ gchac .  If ` A ` and ` ~P A ` are GCH-sets, then the Hartogs number of ` A ` is ` ~P A ` (so ` ~P A ` and a fortiori ` A ` are well-orderable).  The proof is due to Specker.  Theorem 2.1 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 419.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
statement: gchhar $p |- ( ( _om ~<_ A /\ A e. GCH /\ ~P A e. GCH ) -> ( har ` A ) ~~ ~P A ) $.
